section.title: Xlib Compose Keys for ko
section.para: Applications using Xlib input handling should recognize these compose key sequences in locales using the ko compose table.

ko Compose Sequence Sequence Definition This file currently has no entries. It appears that a compose file (even just an empty one) is required for the appropriate keysyms to work for this encoding. <Multi_key> Means <Compose> Special Character

para.emphasis: This compose table defines no sequences of its own.
